subject: Tennis
BNP Paribas Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal eased into the quarterfinals of the BNP Paribas Open in Indian Wells, Calif., beating his countryman Marcel Granollers, 6-1, 6-4.
snippet: Rafael Nadal eased into the quarterfinals of the BNP Paribas Open in Indian Wells, Calif., beating his countryman Marcel Granollers, 6-1, 6-4.
